page.title: 13CHILDREN'S WEEKENDS - 2.
page.content: {Saturday.}1. In the morning I go to "Stage & Tap" with my sister. In the afternoon we go shopping. When we have been round all the shops, we go home in the car. 2. I get up about 8.00a.m., get dressed, go downstairs and have breakfast. At 10.00a.m. my Dad comes home from work. At 11.20a.m. I go horse-riding at Lea Castle Riding School. Sometimes we go on a hack or sometimes we just have lessons. I go home, have my dinner and at 2.00p.m. we usually go out somewhere. When we come back, I sometimes go to Roller Disco. After tea I help in the shop, stocking up and doing the bottles. About 9.00p.m. we have supper and then I go to bed. 3. I watch TV, have my breakfast and then play with my puppy. After dinner I play table-tennis.
